I got the dark red lacey dress and it is a beautiful raspberry shade that is true to the product photos. The lace looks nice also, and doesn't look cheap. Also, a huge plus for me is the fabric does not build up static easily. Overall, a beautiful, lightweight, versitile, and inexpensive dress for semi-formal occasions.
